net.engio.pips.data.utils

Class Registry

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.engio.pips.data.utils.Registry

  • public class Registry
extends Object
    Within a benchmark it may be necessary to share some global counters, data collectors etc. These can be registered at setup time and will be available to the execution units via the Benchmark object. Note: The registry is not thread-safe, such that adding components concurrently while the benchmark is already running will result in concurrency issues like lost items. The registry is meant to be configured completely before the benchmark starts.
    Author:
    bennidi Date: 2/28/14
